column2: (noun) someone who does not know, or believes that it is impossible to know, if god exists
(noun) the belief that all natural things, such as plants, animals, rocks, and thunder, have spirits and can influence human events
(noun) someone who does not believe in any God or gods
(adj) likely or wanting to do something
(verb) to spend time considering a possible future action, or to consider one particular thing for a long time in a serious and quiet way
(verb) to make someone or something into a god
(adj) belonging to or connected with the Christian religion
(verb) to raise someone to a higer rank or more powerful position
(adj) strongly believing in religion, and living in a way that shows this belief
(verb) to give up something that is valuable to you inorder to help another person
